name: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King
name_original: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King
description:
Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King is an action-RPG game developed by FromSoftware. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King has a score of 81. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Dark Souls II: Crown of the Old Iron King is available on PlayStation 3 and PC.
